Compile Using an ARM SDK Project for CodeWarrior

Your release package may contain an ARM SDK Project for CodeWarrior. If so, you can use it to build a ringtone player for your target system.

  1. Double-click "ME2000Test.mcp" in ME2000Test folder
  2. Make the project using the DebugRel target.
  3. Run the program using the ARMulator. It will output a file called "ME2000Test_Data\DebugRel\spmidi_output.wav".
  4. Double click the "spmidi_output.wav" file to hear it.
  5. The file "spmidi_audio_file.c" writes the output of the ME2000 to a WAV file. To port the ME2000 to your target platform, replace it with a custom file that writes to your audio device driver.
